name: Happy Yummy Pop Mania
description:
Happy Yummy Pop Mania - The amazing match-2 puzzle game with coolest Yummy emotion!
Features:
- Almost 150 deliciously addictive levels
- Tap 2 or more same candies to pop
- Pop more jellies each time, you will be rewarded
- Tasty and beautiful graphics
- Easy to play, challenging to fully master
- Completely FREE
